column2: "Oh hey! Peon! Peon, did you fight in the battle with Dark Falz?"
"How was it? Tell me the details, peon!"
"I didn't fight? That's exactly the thing, I wasn't able to!"
"Why? That's because, I was uh.... sleeping."
"There's nothing I could have done! Not like I'm going to interrupt my beauty sleep!"
"My Clarisa didn't wake me up either, almost like it didn't want me to be fighting Dark Falz!"
"Damn it! If I had gone after him, then it wouldn't have turned out like this!"
"I wanted an excuse to blow stuff up! That's why at this championship..."
"Fufufuf! I've got it! Right now I decided that I'll go talk to him!"
"Hey peon! Do your best at the championship, I'll be looking forward to it!"
